name: Noggle Statue - Hydroid Reprise
description: A smaller, wobblier version of the Hydroid statue found in the Relay.

languages.description: Eine kleine, wackeligere Version der Hydroid-Statue, die im Relais gefunden werden kann.
languages.name: Noggle-Statue: Hydroid Reprise

languages.description: Une version plus petite et plus chancelante de la statue d'Hydroid présente dans les Relais.
languages.name: Statuette Noggle - Hydroid Reprise

languages.description: Una versione più piccola e traballante della statua di Hydroid che si trova nella Stazione.
languages.name: Statuetta Noggle - Hydroid Reprise

languages.description: 릴레이에서 볼 수 있는 하이드로이드 조각상의 더 작고, 갸웃거리는 버전입니다.
languages.name: 노글 스태츄 - 하이드로이드 리프라이즈

languages.description: Una pequeña y tambaleante versión de la estatua de Hydroid encontrada en los Repetidores.
languages.name: Estatua Tambaleante - Hydroid Repetición

languages.description: 于中继站内被发现的一尊小型 Hydroid 摇头娃娃。
languages.name: Hydroid 重奏摇头娃娃

languages.description: Небольшая фигурка-копия статуи Гидроида из Реле.
languages.name: Фигурка: Гидроид Возрождение

languages.description: リレーに設置されているHydroid像の小型ボブルヘッド。
languages.name: Hydroid Reprise ボブルヘッド

languages.description: Mniejsza, bardziej chybotliwa wersja statuetki Hydroida w Przekaźniku.
languages.name: Figurka Noggle – Hydroid Reprise

languages.description: Uma estatueta articulada do Hydroid encontrada no Relay.
languages.name: Estatueta: Hydroid Reprise

languages.description: 於中繼站內被發現的一尊小型 Hydroid 搖頭娃娃。
languages.name: Hydroid 重奏搖頭娃娃

languages.description: รูปปั้น Hydroid รุ่นเล็กและสั่นคลอนที่พบในรีเลย์
languages.name: รูปปั้น Noggle - Hydroid Reprise

languages.description: Relay'lerde bulunan Hydroid heykelinin biraz daha çok sallanan ve daha küçük versiyonu.
languages.name: Noggle Heykeli - Hydroid Reprise
